Title: Genesis
Writer: Samaresh Basu (novel), Mohit Chatterjee, Mrinal Sen
Actors: Shabana Azmi, Naseeruddin Shah, Om Puri, M.K. Raina
Plot: A parable of man's exploitation of his fellow man. A weaver and a farmer live peacefully on the edge of a desert until, one day, a woman wanders into their world, and her presence slowly disrupts their routine existence.
